name: Ext_R3_Substance_instance
title: Cross-version Extension for R3.Substance.instance for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents Substance.instance from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Substance|3.0.2 for use in FHIR R5.

element.short: If this describes a specific package/container of the substance
element.definition: Substance may be used to describe a kind of substance, or a specific package/container of the substance: an instance.
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifier associated with the package/container (usually a label affixed directly).
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.definition: Identifier associated with the package/container (usually a label affixed directly).
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: When no longer valid to use
element.definition: When the substance is no longer valid to use. For some substances, a single arbitrary date is used for expiry.
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: When no longer valid to use
element.definition: When the substance is no longer valid to use. For some substances, a single arbitrary date is used for expiry.
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Amount of substance in the package
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Amount of substance in the package
element.comment: `Substance.instance` maps to R5 `Substance.instance`. Has no type mapping Changed from an array to a single value (max cardinality from * to 1). So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
